enumDescriptions.NATIVE: Lets the data store decide what to do with nulls.
enumDescriptions.NULLS_FIRST: A hint to the used data store to order entries with null values before non null entries.
enumDescriptions.NULLS_LAST: A hint to the used data store to order entries with null values after non null entries.

ascending.description: Returns whether sorting for this property shall be ascending.

descending.description: Returns whether sorting for this property shall be descending.

paged.description: Returns whether the current{@link Pageable} contains pagination information.

unpaged.description: Returns whether the current{@link Pageable} does not contain pagination information.

pageNumber.description: Returns the page to be returned.

pageSize.description: Returns the number of items to be returned.

offset.description: Returns the offset to be taken according to the underlying page and page size.

empty.description: Returns whether the current{@link Streamable} is empty.

detailMessage.description:
Specific details about the Throwable.  For example, for
{@code FileNotFoundException}, this contains the name of
the file that could not be found.

cause.description:
The throwable that caused this throwable to get thrown, or null if this
throwable was not caused by another throwable, or if the causative
throwable is unknown.  If this field is equal to this throwable itself,
it indicates that the cause of this throwable has not yet been
initialized.

stackTrace.description:
The stack trace, as returned by{@link #getStackTrace()}.

The field is initialized to a zero-length array.  A{@code
    * null} value of this field indicates subsequent calls to{@link
    * #setStackTrace(StackTraceElement[])} and{@link
    * #fillInStackTrace()} will be no-ops.

items.description:
The throwable that caused this throwable to get thrown, or null if this
throwable was not caused by another throwable, or if the causative
throwable is unknown.  If this field is equal to this throwable itself,
it indicates that the cause of this throwable has not yet been
initialized.

suppressedExceptions.description:
The list of suppressed exceptions, as returned by{@link
    * #getSuppressed()}.  The list is initialized to a zero-element
unmodifiable sentinel list.  When a serialized Throwable is
read in, if the{@code suppressedExceptions} field points to a
zero-element list, the field is reset to the sentinel value.

classLoaderName.description: The name of the class loader.

format.description: Control to show full or partial module, package, and class names.

earlySendAttempts.description: Store send data before handler is initialized.

complete.description: Store successful completion before the handler is initialized.

failure.description: Store an error before the handler is initialized.

anyOf.description:
The throwable that caused this throwable to get thrown, or null if this
throwable was not caused by another throwable, or if the causative
throwable is unknown.  If this field is equal to this throwable itself,
it indicates that the cause of this throwable has not yet been
initialized.
